name: Polarity: How I Learned to Stop Caring and Love Magnetism
name_original: Polarity: How I Learned to Stop Caring and Love Magnetism
description: Polarity: How I Learned to Stop Caring and Love Magnetism, is a block puzzle game created by Matthew Danielson and Wilson Russell- the objective with this game is to push the blocks into the correct slots, while at the same time being able to push the blocks away from you without touching them, or pulling them closer to you!
